FactionLanguages.DialectDef.label: Illuminate Standard
FactionLanguages.DialectDef.description: A simplified version of the standard language, designed to be as easy to understand and learn as possible for it's native species, though others may find it more difficult. It uses a limited vocabulary, simple grammatical constructions, and a minimum number of exceptions. This dialect simplifies communication between people of different cultural backgrounds, reduces the likelihood of misunderstandings, and makes the language more accessible to learn.
